Text: Joanna Wajs:  She studied Polish and Italian philology at the University of Warsaw.

<Text: Joanna Wajs:  Her prose works and poetry have been published in numerous respected literary periodicals in Poland.>

Text: Joanna Wajs:  Her first collection of poems, entitled "Sprzedawcy kieszonkowych lusterek" (pocket mirror salesman), was published in 2004 by the publishing house Zielona Sowa in Krakow.
